page.title: 08 Ragmarsh Farm
page.content:
Ragmarsh{farm}is at Wrabness along side the River Stour.It has 380 acres for{farming.} There are: 52 acres of potatoes. 14 acres of peas . 100 acres of wheat. 20 acres of grass for cattle 194 acres of barley.
The farmer keeps some {cattle. }The cattle are heffers and bullocks for beef. He keeps one bull for breeding his beef cattle. This time of year in July a lot of calves are born. He has to spray the{crops}to kill the green fly. He grows some high grade wheat for making bread. His peas go into tins.He sells his potatoes locally and most of his grain goes to the maltings to be made into beer.
